content:
(hope this is the right channel)

I'd like to teach the triagebot on the rust-lang/compiler-team repo the action [relabel] as I often apply labels in batch with a github comment template.
Would that make sense? Sorry if I'm missing a previous discussion on this
if you mean just adding the config, should be easy to enable that feature with just a PR, I see no reason not to
exactly, if there are no opposing opinions I will push a small patch for that
